# Karolewko, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Karolewko  () is a settlement in the administrative district of Gmina Bartoszyce, within Bartoszyce County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  north-west of Bartoszyce and  north of the regional capital Olsztyn.
